1/2 teaspoon hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's RedHotÂ®)
des: "The perfect companion for shrimp and seafood. Easy and fast. Keeps in fridge for at least two weeks, covered."
ins: Whisk the ketchup, chili sauce, horseradish, brown sugar, lemon juice, hot sauce, garlic salt, and onion powder together in a bowl until the sugar has dissolved; cover. Refrigerate at least 1 hour before serving.
